feed.title: Concerns Regarding Threats by a Developer to Remove Commit Access from Other Developers

entry.title: Concerns Regarding Threats by a Developer to Remove Commit Access from Other Developers
entry.summary: There have been allegations that a project is being "run like wikipedia" or involved in an "edit war", but these claims are false and can be verified by checking the commit history. This statement was made in response to a Reddit post by Gregory, who expressed his belief that Gavin would revert any pull request for a block size change if he were to merge it.
